division: Andaman and Nicobar Islands Transport Department
description: AN-01 is the primary Regional Transport Office for the Andaman and Nicobar Islands, located in the capital city of Sri Vijaya Puram (formerly Port Blair). It serves as the central administrative hub for vehicle registration, driving licenses, and permit issuance for the South Andaman district and surrounding regions.
address: Directorate of Transport, Andaman and Nicobar Administration, Tagore Road, Sri Vijaya Puram, Andaman and Nicobar Islands
